title: Looking for this font
content:
Hello all, Im looking for a font called “Benjamin Cap”. I cant find it anywhere, it seems to be a popular wedding invitation font. I keep finding a different cursive like Benjamin, but not the one I am in need of (image underneath is of the correct font). Can anyone point me to a place that offers this one?  
Thank you,  
Fidel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050108im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Or4304_6632.2_inv.jpg)

 [‹ DVD font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050108/http:/typophile.com/node/43954 "Go to previous forum topic") [Slant Magazine (Condensed Sans-Serif) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050108/http:/typophile.com/node/43948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fiddle

comments.content:
Looks like it’s part of a package called “Fonts and Graphics for Weddings.” It is sold on this website:

[http://www.mountaincow.com/shop.fonts.FGW.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050108/http:/www.mountaincow.com/shop.fonts.FGW.html "http://www.mountaincow.com/shop.fonts.FGW.html")
